did.unittitle: Boston and Mississippi Cotton Land Company records
did.abstract: Letters, financial papers, and legal documents concerning the company's business in Boston, Mass., northern Mississippi, and eastern Tennessee, including land investment and sales, cash transfers, stock and dividends, trustee salaries, and the Boston and New York Chickasaw Land Co. Correspondents are company officials in Boston, its agents in the South, and associated businessmen.
